education.institution: University of North Carolina at Chapel Hill

projects.name: Predictive Analytics for NBA Betting Spreads Using Machine Learning
highlights: Developed a predictive model using advanced machine learning algorithms to analyze NBA game spread outcomes, achieving the second-highest accuracy in the class
Utilized regression analysis and random forest models to enhance the accuracy of predictions
Developed a custom data preprocessing pipeline in R to clean, transform, and normalize large datasets

projects.name: Chicago Crime Data Project
highlights: Directed a semester-long project analyzing crime dataset from Kaggle regarding crime in Chicago
Created dynamic crime maps using R plotting tools to visualize crime hotspots through heatmaps and GIF animations with ggplot
Delivered compelling presentations to share project insights, highlighting associations between crime rates, poverty, and mental health

projects.name: Dota 2 (Online Gaming) Draft Picker
highlights: Created a Python-based web scraping tool to extract real-time data from Dota 2, including character statistics, win rates, and game outcomes
Designed algorithms to analyze character combinations and select the most effective team composition

work.name: Home Depot, Inc.
work.summary: Handled transactions and created day to day schedules for all other cashiers.
highlights: Demonstrated leadership by overseeing and guiding a team of cashiers
Assisted in inventory management by tracking sales and coordinating with store owner
Optimized checkout processes to reduce wait times and enhance experience for customers

volunteer.summary: Musical Empowerment is a non-profit organization based in the research triangle area that serves to provide free music lessons to children who may not afford the cost of a real music teacher.
highlights: Orchestrated successful music events, engaging children from underserved communities in Carrboro
Maintained open and effective communication with over 100 parents, addressing inquiries, gathering feedback, and fostering a strong parent-organization relationship
Gathered parent feedback using Google Forms and Excel to implement data-driven improvements, aligning students with top-performing teachers
